<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mind over Matter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3695) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 29</row>

</column>

---

Your mind's limits are only what you imagine them to be. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.
name: Mind over Matter
